description: Curated soundtrack for wandering Davao museums—quiet halls, heritage echoes, island soul.

items.name: D’ Bone Collector Museum
items.description: The D Bone Collector Museum showcases animals from every corner of the planet. From the deep turquoise oceans to the local rivers, it presents over 26 whales, dolphins and fish skeletons. Moreover, you will also find the preserved remains of the world's tallest bird species among others. A visit to this museum will surely be an unbeatable educational experience for both young as well as old visitors.
items.location_hint: San Pedro St, Poblacion District, Davao City, Davao del Sur, Philippines

items.name: Davao Museum Of History And Ethnography
items.description: The Davao museum of history and ethnography houses well-presented articles and artifacts which showcase the Philippine culture beautifully. It unfolds the history of Davao city through art and sculptures and offers an educational, two-hour tour to its visitors after which they step out delighted and well-informed. It's among the best museums in Davao City for history geeks, school students, and researchers who wish to learn about the charming culture and heritage of the Philippines.
items.location_hint: Zonta Building, 113 Agusan Circle, Insular Village 1, Lanang, Davao City, Davao Del Sur, Philippines
items.opening_hours_text: 9 AM – 12 PM, 1 PM – 5 PM (Closed on Sunday)

items.name: Upside Down House Museum
items.location_hint: Dacudao Ave, Agdao, Davao City, Davao del Sur, Philippines

items.name: Subangan Davao Oriental Museum
items.description: The word ‘Subangan' means where the sun rises. The Subangan Davao Oriental is one of the best Davao city museums, which gives an educational tour to its visitors. The lively and elegant environment inside begins from the moment you enter the museum and witness the huge skeleton of a sperm whale which was found in the shores of Davao Oriental.

items.name: Reel to Real 3D Tricks and Arts
items.description: The Reel to Real 3D Tricks and Arts Museum is a place decorated with various 3D art designs that look so real that you won't be able to tell the difference! Although the place is not huge, it is a great place to visit if you are planning to have a family day out and click a bunch of pictures while posing with creative backgrounds.
items.location_hint: Agdao, Davao City, Davao del Sur, Philippines

items.name: Museo Dabawenyo
items.description: The Museo Dabawenyo is a place which is also known as the ‘People's Museum'. With its great artifacts and paintings, it showcases the evolution of the city of Davao, its people, and its culture. This mid-size regional museum has a unique collection of art, which is fresh, unedited, and informative all at the same time. Learn about the important historical moments of Davao City that shaped it into what it is today.
items.location_hint: Andres Bonifacio Rotunda, Poblacion District, Davao City, Davao del Sur, Philippines
